casebody.data:
PONTIN LIGHTERAGE COMPANY, Libelant-Appellant, v. AMERICAN EXPORT LINES, Inc., Respondent-Appellee. No. 202, Docket 23705. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Dec. 21, 1955. Decided Jan. 11, 1956. Foley & Martin, New York City (Christopher E. Heckman, Néw York City, of counsel), for appellant. Haight, Gardner, Poor & Havens, New York City (Kenneth Gardner, John Os-nato, Jr., New York City, and John J. Mulcahy, Jr., Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for appellee.

Before FRANK, HINCKS and LUM-BARD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

We affirm on the opinion of Judge Gal-ston, 126 F.Supp. 824.
